job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Configuring reusable template elements, called AI Controllers in several tools, most notably in ComfyUI
     * Using various image manipulation tools (both AI and traditional) to create the elements needed for controlling the AI (depth-maps, retouched elements, segmenters and refiners, various models and LoRas)
     * Support on and managing the training of customized models and LoRas
     * Ensure AI is used in a controlled way to generate high visual quality final usable outputs for our clients
job_details.full_text:
Generative AI Engineer

* Configuring reusable template elements, called AI Controllers in several tools, most notably in ComfyUI
     * Using various image manipulation tools (both AI and traditional) to create the elements needed for controlling the AI (depth-maps, retouched elements, segmenters and refiners, various models and LoRas)
     * Support on and managing the training of customized models and LoRas
     * Ensure AI is used in a controlled way to generate high visual quality final usable outputs for our clients

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the use and configuration of generative AI tools like ComfyUI, the manipulation of AI-generated elements (models, LoRas), and the training of customized models. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, focusing on developing and deploying applications built on generative models, including fine-tuning and managing AI outputs for clients.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'managing the training of customized models and LoRas' and 'configuring reusable template elements... in ComfyUI', which are core activities in adapting and utilizing generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: managing the training of customized models and LoRas

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Using various image manipulation tools (both AI and traditional) to create the elements needed for controlling the AI (depth-maps, retouched elements, segmenters and refiners, various models and LoRas)' directly relates to preparing and manipulating data and models for generative AI tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Using various image manipulation tools (both AI and traditional) to create the elements needed for controlling the AI (depth-maps, retouched elements, segmenters and refiners, various models and LoRas)

job_tasks.justification: Configuring 'AI Controllers in several tools, most notably in ComfyUI' implies building and integrating AI functionalities into a system or application.
job_tasks.phrase: Configuring reusable template elements, called AI Controllers in several tools, most notably in ComfyUI

job_tasks.justification: The goal to 'Ensure AI is used in a controlled way to generate high visual quality final usable outputs for our clients' points to the development of user-facing outputs and applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensure AI is used in a controlled way to generate high visual quality final usable outputs for our clients

soft_skills.phrase: Ensure AI is used in a controlled way to generate high visual quality final usable outputs for our clients
